title: Where online can you learn about patents? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends upon what you’re seeking to learn. If you’re completely new to the topic, I’d suggest starting with the USPTO website. If you’re looking for something a little deeper, IPWatchdog is reasonable. If you’re looking for ‘in the weeds’ analysis on the latest, Patently-O is a good site. Udemy has a number of inexpensive courses taught by patent professionals that cater to a variety of experience levels. Inventor Reddit forums are OK, and of course, asking particular questions on Quora can be helpful.
